word_mean: 噬菌体：溶解细菌的一种病毒。见virus项下的bacterial virus

sentence.Network_en: Bacteriophage has been used to treat bacterial infections since it was discovered.
sentence.Network_cn: 噬菌体自发现之初就被人们应用于治疗各种细菌感染.

sentence.Network_en: And most of these viruses - called bacteriophage, or short - make their bacterial victims sick.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些病毒叫做噬菌体,它们中的大多数能使细菌治病, 甚至致使其死亡.

sentence.Network_en: Bacteriophage ( phage ) A virus that infects bacteria.
sentence.Network_cn: 噬菌体 :感染细菌的病毒.

means.word_mean: 1. a virus that is parasitic in bacteria; it uses the bacterium's machinery and energy to produce more phage until the bacterium is destroyed and phage is released to invade surrounding bacteria

auth_sentence.content: Bacteriophage are a group of viruses which infect and kill bacteria.
